hmmm, wierd, I thought I already fixed that.

There're are multiple cases when the bindings can be null, when setting breakpoints.

simple test case :

int i=
  2 +
  z;    // <-- add breakpoint here, z is not defined

ValidBreakpointLocationLocator - added null check on the bindings.
